00028 void CalibPlugin::drawFrame()
00029 {
00030     // calibration code -- no trivial painting done of num x num random rectangles
00031     const float meanintensity = 0.5f, variance = 0.05f;
00032     const int num = 1;
00033 
00034     int w = width(), h = height(), x = 0, y = 0, xincr = w/num, yincr = h/num;
00035     for (;;) {
00036         glColor3f( meanintensity + ran1Gen.range(-variance,variance), meanintensity + ran1Gen.range(-variance,variance), meanintensity + ran1Gen.range(-variance,variance) );
00037         glRecti( x, y, x+xincr, y+yincr );
00038         if ( (x += xincr) + xincr > w ) x = 0, y += yincr;
00039         if ( y + yincr > h ) break;
00040     }
00041     static const unsigned calibTot = 240;
00042     Debug() << "Frame " << frameNum << " fpsnow " << fps << " avg " << fpsAvg << " hwframe " << getHWFrameCount();
00043     if (frameNum >= calibTot) {
00044         stop();
00045         emit refreshRateCalibrated(static_cast<unsigned>(::round(fpsAvg)));
00046         emit finished();
00047     }
00048 }
00049 
00050 bool CalibPlugin::init()
00051 {
00052 #if 0
00053     if (!StimApp::instance()->busy()) {
00054         Error() << "Calib plugin can only be started once, at app initialization. Sorry!";
00055         return false;
00056     }
00057 #endif
00058     wasDebugMode = StimApp::instance()->isDebugMode();
00059     StimApp::instance()->setDebugMode(false);  // force debug mode off to minimize console printing
00060     StimApp::lockMouseKeyboard();
00061     Log() << "Calib plugin locked mouse and keyboard to minimize paint events (please wait)";
00062     return true;
00063 }
00064 
00065 void CalibPlugin::cleanup()
00066 {
00067     StimApp::releaseMouseKeyboard();
00068     
00069     StimApp::instance()->setDebugMode(wasDebugMode);  // re-enable debug mode if it was set
00070     Log() << "Calib plugin released mouse and keyboard";
00071 }
